original_text: On the south side shall be the standard of the camp of Reuben according to their armies: and the captain of the children of Reuben shall be Elizur the son of Shedeur.
korean_text: 남쪽에는 르우벤 군대 진영의 군기가 있을 것이라 르우벤 자손의 지휘관은 스데울의 아들 엘리술이요

sentences.original_text: On the south side shall be the standard of the camp of Reuben
sentences.korean_translation: 남쪽에는 르우벤 진의 기가 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and the captain of the children of Reuben
shall be Elizur the son of Shedeur
